metadata.Title: CVE-2023-28370 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.Description:
Open redirect vulnerability in Tornado versions 6.3.1 and earlier allows aremote unauthenticated attacker to redirect a user to an arbitrary web siteand conduct a phishing attack by having user access a specially craftedURL.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-28370` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

python3-tornado - 6.2.0-3ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: python-tornado package in lunar was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.2.0-3ubuntu0.1').
